EN: Life expectancy increases with health expenditure, usually...
Life Expectancy vs Health expenditure over time (1970-2014)
(adjusted for inflation, at PPP in 2010 USD)
remix of Our World in Data (https://ourworldindata.org/the-link-between-life-expectancy-and-health-spending-us-focus)
* at purchasing power parity (constant 2010 international USD).

Total health expenditure is the sum of public and private health expenditures as a ratio of total population. It covers the provision of health services (preventive and curative), family planning activities, nutrition activities, and emergency aid designated for health
FR: Le total des dépenses de santé est la somme des dépenses de santé publiques et privées en tant que ratio de l'ensemble de la population. Il englobe la prestation de services de santé (préventifs et curatifs), les activités de planification familiale, les activités ayant trait à la nutrition et l'aide d'urgence réservée à la santé.

EN: In 2014. Bubbles are sized according to the share of healthcare expenditure out of countries' total gross domestic product (GDP)
(adjusted for inflation, at PPP constant 2011 USD)

JA: クリックで表示・非表示の切り替えができます

EN: * at purchasing power parity (constant 2011 international USD).
FR: * à parité de pouvoir d'achat (USD internationaux constants de 2011).
